mapper.select: SELECT r.*, m.id as matzip_id, m.name as matzip_name, m.address as matzip_address FROM my_review r INNER JOIN matzip m ON r.matzip_id = m.id WHERE r.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY r.regdate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO my_review (matzip_id, member_id, content, regdate, star_rating) VALUES (#{matzipId}, #{memberId}, #{content}, #{regdate}, #{starRating})

INSERT IGNORE INTO review_tag (tag_id, my_review_id, regdate) VALUES
(#{reviewTag.tagId}, #{reviewTag.reviewId}, COALESCE(#{reviewTag.regdate}, NOW()))
mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id FROM my_matzip m INNER JOIN friend f ON (f.sender_id = #{memberId} AND f.receiver_id = m.member_id OR f.receiver_id = #{memberId} AND f.sender_id = m.member_id) WHERE f.is_accept = TRUE AND m.visibility = 'HIDDEN' AND matzip_id = #{matzipId}
